Philip Morris & Leo Frances hodgson burnett Adopt - A - Market II Miami Team Members: Leo Burnett Media T. Schlax Philip Morris Brand Double u. Smith D. Stern E. Schneidman Leo Burnett Client Service M. Copus Duke of edinburgh Morris Media G. Capreol D. Seville (MS) July 28 - 29, 1994 ors9e0zv0z
summary: Philip Morris & Leo Burnett created Adopt-A-Market II in 1994. The first meeting was held in Miami, Florida, on July 28-29, 1994, and the second in Seville, Spain on August 1-2, 1995. It was the first time the market was opened to non-US companies.
